summary: Build “ACADEMIA AI – Student Academic Command Center”: a modern dark-mode SaaS-style full-stack Next.js (App Router) + TypeScript web app using Tailwind, Supabase (DB + Auth), and OpenAI API, including landing, auth, dashboard, study planner, AI assistant, career roadmap, focus tracker, settings, and free/pro AI-usage limits.
architectural_notes: Tech stack: Next.js (App Router) + TypeScript frontend and Next.js API routes backend
Styling: Tailwind CSS with dark mode default; modern SaaS dashboard UI with sidebar + responsive collapse
Backend services: Supabase for Postgres database and Supabase Auth (email/password)
AI integration: OpenAI API used for study plan generation, study assistant chat, and career roadmap generation
Plan limits: Free plan limited to 10 AI queries/day; Pro plan unlimited; enforce with upgrade prompt
Deployment readiness: env vars for API keys, production optimizations, error handling, loading states, toast notifications

existing_features.title: Implement a cohesive modern SaaS-style UI in dark mode by default with a premium, minimal look (rounded cards, soft shadows, subtle gradient accents, smooth hover/transition effects, clean typography) and ensure full responsiveness including a collapsible mobile sidebar.

Create a public Landing page with: Hero (headline "Your Personal AI Academic Command Center", subtext "Organize. Focus. Win."), CTA buttons ("Get Started", "Login"), Features section listing (Smart Study Planner, AI Study Assistant, Career Roadmap Generator, Focus & Habit Tracker), Pricing section (Free Plan, Pro Plan ₹299/month), and a footer with links (About, Contact, Privacy Policy).

Implement authentication using Internet Identity and provide Login/Sign up pages that collect and persist the requested profile fields on first sign-in: Full Name, College Name, Course, Year of Study (1–4), Target Career; redirect authenticated users to the dashboard; and protect all app routes under the authenticated area so only logged-in users can access them.

Build the main authenticated app shell with a Left Sidebar (Dashboard, Study Planner, AI Assistant, Career Roadmap, Focus Tracker, Settings, Logout) and a Top Bar showing user name, a notification icon, and a profile dropdown.
Implement the Dashboard page widgets: Today’s Study Tasks, Focus Score (percentage), Upcoming Exams, Weekly Productivity Graph, and a Quick Ask box for the assistant.

Implement the Study Planner module with the ability to add Subject, add Topic, set Deadline, view tasks in (a) calendar view and (b) task list view, and show a progress bar per subject based on task completion status.

Add a "Syllabus text to plan" input in Study Planner that generates a structured daily breakdown into study tasks; because external LLM APIs are not supported, implement a deterministic local planner (rule-based chunking) that produces daily tasks from the provided syllabus text and deadline range, and clearly label it as an automated planner.

Implement the AI Study Assistant page with a chat UI (ChatGPT-like) including prebuilt prompt buttons: Explain in Simple Terms, Make 5-Mark Answer, Create Flashcards, Summarize Notes, Generate MCQs; store chat history per user; and provide a Quick Ask capability consistent with the dashboard widget.

Enforce plan-based assistant usage limits: Free plan allows 10 assistant queries per day per user; Pro plan is unlimited; show an upgrade popup once the free limit is reached and block additional queries until the next day or until plan is upgraded.

Implement the Career Roadmap module with inputs (Degree, Target Job, Timeline) and generate a structured roadmap output (skill roadmap, recommended tools, project suggestions, internship path) rendered as a timeline-style UI; generation must be local/deterministic (no external AI calls).

Implement the Focus Tracker module with: Pomodoro timer (25 minutes), daily focus score, habit streak tracking, weekly productivity chart, and persistence of focus sessions (duration and date) per user.

Implement the Settings page to: edit profile (name, college, course, year, target career), change password (where applicable via identity provider UX), toggle dark/light mode, display subscription status (Free/Pro), and provide logout.

Add production-quality UX states across the app: loading indicators for data fetches, error handling for failed operations, and toast notifications for key actions (save, create task, completed session, quota reached).

new_feature_requests.summary: Landing page with hero, CTA (Get Started/Login), features list, pricing (Free/Pro ₹299/mo), and footer links (About/Contact/Privacy)
Authentication flows using Supabase Auth (email/password): login + signup with profile fields and redirect to dashboard
Main dashboard layout (sidebar + top bar) and dashboard widgets (tasks, focus score, upcoming exams, weekly graph, quick AI ask)
Study Planner module: subjects/topics/deadlines, calendar & list views, progress per subject, and AI-generated daily task breakdown from syllabus text
AI Study Assistant chat page with prebuilt prompt buttons, chat history storage, and free-plan daily query limits
Career Roadmap module: inputs (degree/target job/timeline) and AI-generated structured timeline roadmap outputs
Focus Tracker module: Pomodoro timer, daily focus score, habit streaks, weekly productivity chart, and session storage
Settings page: edit profile, change password, dark/light toggle, subscription status, and logout
Business logic & UX: route protection for authenticated areas, AI quota enforcement (Free 10/day, Pro unlimited) with upgrade popup, plus loading/error/toast states
Supabase database schema setup for Users, StudyTasks, FocusSessions, and ChatHistory

Implement backend canister data models and CRUD APIs to persist: Users (profile fields + plan), StudyTasks (subject, topic, deadline, status), FocusSessions (duration, date), and ChatHistory (message, response, timestamp), all scoped by the authenticated user principal.
